<script>
// Language Switching Function
function switchLanguage(lang) {
  // Update button states
  document.getElementById('lang-en').classList.toggle('active', lang === 'en');
  document.getElementById('lang-id').classList.toggle('active', lang === 'id');
  
  // Get all elements with data-en and data-id attributes
  const elements = document.querySelectorAll('[data-en][data-id]');
  
  elements.forEach(element => {
    const enText = element.getAttribute('data-en');
    const idText = element.getAttribute('data-id');
    
    if (enText && idText) {
      element.textContent = lang === 'en' ? enText : idText;
    }
  });
  
  // Update placeholder for email input
  const emailInput = document.querySelector('.email-input');
  if (emailInput) {
    const placeholderEn = emailInput.getAttribute('data-placeholder-en');
    const placeholderId = emailInput.getAttribute('data-placeholder-id');
    emailInput.placeholder = lang === 'en' ? placeholderEn : placeholderId;
  }
  
  // Store language preference
  localStorage.setItem('preferredLanguage', lang);
}

// Load preferred language on page load
document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', function() {
  const preferredLang = localStorage.getItem('preferredLanguage') || 'en';
  if (preferredLang === 'id') {
    switchLanguage('id');
  }
});
</script>
